Package project.restaurant.controllers

Class KitchenStaffController

java.lang.Object
project.restaurant.controllers.KitchenStaffController
@Controller public class KitchenStaffController extends Object
KitchenStaffController manages front-end to back-end connection for kitchen staff related activity.
Author:
Pengyuan, Tanmeet, Wen

  • Method Details

    • getKitchenOrders

      @GetMapping("/kitchenStaffOrders") public String getKitchenOrders(org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      A getMapping method for kitchenStaffOrders web page. This method get orders that is waiting for cooking, is cooking, is ready and have been cancelled
      Parameters:
      model - A method to identify a menu item and category on one webpage
      session - A method to identify a user, a kitchenstaff or a waiter across more than one page
      Returns:
      "kitchenStaffOrders" The web page help kitchenstaff do cooking stuff

    • changeStateToCooking

      @PostMapping("/changeToCooking") public String changeStateToCooking(@Param("input") Integer input, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      A postMapping method for cooking button on kitchenStaffOrders web page. This method will set the state of corresponding order to cooking state.
      Parameters:
      input - is the order id of the row of the table
      model - A method to identify a menu item and category on one webpage
      session - A method to identify a user, a kitchenstaff or a waiter across more than one page
      Returns:
      "kitchenStaffOrders" The web page help kitchenstaff do cooking stuff

    • changeStateToReady

      @PostMapping("/changeToReady") public String changeStateToReady(@Param("input") Integer input, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      A postMapping method for finish cooking button on kitchenStaffOrders web page. This method will set the state of corresponding order to ready state.
      Parameters:
      input - is the order id of the row of the table
      model - A method to identify a menu item and category on one webpage
      session - A method to identify a user, a kitchenstaff or a waiter across more than one page
      Returns:
      "kitchenStaffOrders" The web page help kitchenstaff do cooking stuff

    • viewOrderDetail

      @PostMapping("/viewDetail") public String viewOrderDetail(@Param("input") Integer input, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      A postMapping method for view button in cooking state table on "kitchenStaffOrders" web page. This method will call getOrderDetail to go to "orderdetail" web page to show detail of order.
      Parameters:
      input - is the order id of the row of the table
      model - A method to identify a menu item and category on one webpage
      Returns:
      "orderdetail" The web page show detail of order for kitchenstaff

    • viewDetailsForReady

      @PostMapping("/viewDetailsForReady") public String viewDetailsForReady(@Param("input") Integer input, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      A postMapping method for view button in ready state table on "kitchenStaffOrders" web page. This method will call getOrderDetail to go to "orderdetail" web page to show detail of order.
      Parameters:
      input - is the order id of the row of the table
      model - A method to identify a menu item and category on one webpage
      Returns:
      "viewDetailsForReady" The web page show detail of order for kitchenstaff

    • getOrderDetail

      @GetMapping("/orderdetail") public String getOrderDetail(@Param("input") Integer input, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      A getMapping method for "orderdetail" web page. This method get item in the order for the web page.
      Parameters:
      input - is the order id of the row of the table
      model - A method to identify a menu item and category on one webpage
      Returns:
      "orderdetail" The web page show detail of order for kitchenstaff

    • finishOrder

      @PostMapping("/finishOrder") public String finishOrder(@Param("input") Integer input, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      A postMapping method for finish button on "orderdetail" web page. This method will set the order state to ready.
      Parameters:
      input - is the order id of the row of the table
      model - A method to identify a menu item and category on one webpage
      Returns:
      "orderdetail" The web page show detail of order for kitchenstaff

    • deleteOrder

      @PostMapping("/deleteOrder") public String deleteOrder(@Param("input") Integer input, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      A postMapping method for cancel button in cancelled state orders table on "kitchenStaffOrders" web page. This method will help kitchenstaff confirm the order have been cancelled. The order will be deleted from database after kitchenstaff confirmed it.
      Parameters:
      input - is the order id of the row of the table
      model - A method to identify a menu item and category on one webpage
      Returns:
      "kitchenStaffOrders" The web page help kitchenstaff do cooking stuff
